voicesplitting.generic

Class MidiModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • voicesplitting.generic.MidiModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VoiceSplittingModel

    public abstract class MidiModel
extends java.lang.Object
    A MidiModel is an abstract class which defines any model which takes a series of MidiNotes incrementally as input and generates some sort of hypothesis.

    The notes are input through the handleIncoming(List), and the hypothesis can be obtained through the getHypotheses() method.

    Anyone wishing to create a new type of Midi Model (besides a voice splitter) should extend this class to another abstract class defining that type of model, as was done in VoiceSplittingModel.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 4 Sept, 2015

    • Method Detail

      • handleIncoming

        public abstract void handleIncoming(java.util.List<MidiNote> notes)
        This method takes as input some List of MidiNotes, and then does some work on the notes, updating its list of hypothesis MidiModelStates in the process.

        NOTE: It is assumed that the note Lists passed into this method will be passed chronologically. Specifically, each time this method is invoked, it should be passed the List of MidiNotes which occur next in the MIDI song currently being read. This is done automatically by the NoteListGenerator.getIncomingLists() method.

        Usually, this method should do little more than simply passing along the notes list to its MidiModelState's MidiModelState.handleIncoming(List) method and updating current hypotheses with the result.

        Parameters:
        notes - A List of the MidiNotes which we want to handle next.

      • getHypotheses

        public abstract java.util.TreeSet<? extends MidiModelState> getHypotheses()
        This method returns a TreeSet of the current hypothesis states of this MidiModel.

        The most highly scoring state can be retrieved by using getHypotheses().first().

        NOTE: This is dependent on proper implimentation of the MidiModelState's compareTo method.

        Returns:
        A TreeSet of the current hypothesis states of this MidiModel, in their natural order.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Return the String representation of this MidiModel. It will be an ordered list of its current hypothesis MidiModelStates, surrounded by braces.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The String representation of this MidiModel.
